title: AI-Based Adaptive Mandarin Learning Program Design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced Mandarin grammar and vocabulary proficiency
context.additional_context: A program focused on improving research paper writing and reading comprehension skills for graduate science majors

learning_goals: Learners will achieve a 30% improvement in Chinese academic paper reading speed within 8 weeks using an AI-driven adaptive learning system
Learners will reduce grammatical error rates by 50% in Chinese writing through a personalized feedback system
Learners will attain Level 3 or higher on a 4-point rubric for self-directed learning planning using system-generated analytics reports

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
